job_description: Position SummaryThe successful candidate will join the Technology team as an intern and help senior software professionals on the team with the implementation and maintenance of interactive web-based applications, practice tests, and other instructional products.This position reports to the Manager, Technology.Responsibilities• Develop and maintain web-based instructional products and tests• Work directly with instructional designers and senior developers to help define and implement solutions• Develop and maintain software tools and web applications• Perform quality assurance duties to ensure that software programs execute properly and return valid results• Participate in scrum meetings• Conduct research as directed by the Manager, Technology• Conduct presentations on technical topics when required
job_requirements: Requirements• HTML, CSS, JavaScript, JQuery, AngularJS, XML and JSON experience• HTML5 would be an asset• Knowledge of C# (or Java), ASP.NET and/or ASP.NET MVC• Familiar with SQL Server, database queries and stored procedures• University student in Computer Science, Computer Engineering or related discipline• Quick learner and be able to work collaboratively in a team environment• Excellent written and communication skillsOpen To All Majors:No
